title: Quintessential Italian Escape with Indulgent Beverage & Dining Inclusions
description: Live the Tuscan lifestyle like a local, staying at the elegant Hotel Executive Siena, located in the residential neighbourhood of Scacciapensieri - close to Siena's numerous charms and famed medieval buildings. Indulge with decadent inclusions such as daily breakfast, nightly three course dinner with a glass of wine, a nightly wine or prosecco each, a tourist pass to all the city's museums and a guided one-hour walking tour.

title: Italian Elegance in Historic Siena, Tuscany

Includes an airport pick up, daily buffet breakfasts, nightly three-course dinners with wine, a nightly prosecco or wine each and a pass to all the museums in the city.
offer_address: Via Nazareno Orlandi, 32, 53100 Siena SI, Italy
